EACH RIPPLE REPRESENTS ANOTHER LOCATION AND THE POWER OF GROWTH IN MAKING A DIFFERENCE. PURCHASE A GIFT CARD SPAVIA Winter Park DAY SPA IN Winter Park Relax. You deserve a break. Recenter. Immerse yourself in relaxation and tranquility. Renew. Recharged and refocused you can conquer all that the day has in store for you. Spavia Winter Park is all about you – you select treatments that best suit your needs and desires. Our therapists and estheticians care about your well-being and provide each spa treatment in the most personalized, professional manner possible. Begin your relaxation by unwinding in our peaceful Spavia retreat room. Each guest is provided with a spa robe, spa sandals and a warmed aromatherapy neck pillow for the ultimate rest and relaxation. Whether you desire a soothing massage or a rejuvenating body wrap, our specialists will assist you in creating the perfect day spa experience. Turn back the clock with a nourishing facial and finish your spa day with an all-natural beauty treatment. You will leave the spa looking – and feeling – your best. When you are looking for a break from the everyday stresses, we invite you to relax, recenter and renew at Spavia Winter Park . Schedule your relaxation today! SCHEDULE YOUR RELAXATION Section Three Section Four Section Five Section Six Section Seven Section Eight Section Nine Section Ten Section Eleven Spavia Winter Park 110 Orlando Avenue Suite 9 , Winter Park , FL 32789 407.670.3200 Hours of Operation Monday: 9am to 8pm Tuesday: 9am to 8pm Wednesday: 9am to 8pm Thursday: 9am to 8pm Friday: 9 to 8pm Saturday: 9am to 6pm Sunday: 11am to 6pm PURCHASE A GIFT CARD Spavia Memberships Available This year, say yes to self-care! Members enjoy special offers! LEARN MORE Section Twelve When the founders Allison and Marty Langenderfer created the Spavia brand, they wanted to create a name that reflected the products and services it offered and deliver results to help their guests relax, recenter, and renew. What’s in a name? Spavia- ‘via’ in many languages means route or pathway. Our interpretation of Spavia is the route or journey to wellness. Each of our guests have their own journey and at Spavia, it’s so important to create customized, result-driven treatments in a tranquil environment for our guests. It’s our guests’ journey and it begins at Spavia. It is such a humbling experience to know that since 2005, that has been our focus and today with our growth and owners, brand partners and Spavia team members, we are making a difference. Thank you for entrusting Spavia on your journey to wellness and being our guest. We are so grateful. OUR STORY On September 25, 2005, Spavia opened its doors with a mission and vision of making a positive difference in the world one guest at a time and delivering an exceptional experience our guests couldn’t live without. For us, it’s been about a journey, not a race to build a legacy and reputation of being the best, delivering the best and creating a Spavia culture that we are proud of each and every day. We are humbled and grateful for the opportunity to open our doors each day, create exceptional experiences and give back to our communities. Today, we are doing just that and our focus in creating the best experience with the best products and spa treatments is stronger than ever! Spavia is rapidly growing and with that comes great responsibility to ensure that we are offering the best to our guests, our teams, and our franchise owners. Thank you for being a part of the Spavia journey and welcome to the Spavia family! Additional Membership Beneﬁts: Spavia members enjoy offers on additional treatments, save 50% on all boosts, and receive exclusive access to Bring-a-Friend Essential Gift Cards. Section Three WHY A SPAVIA MEMBERSHIP? Spavia members enjoy an exceptional experience each month, along with benefits only a Spavia membership offers! With three levels of membership and customization of your treatments, there is an affordable wellness membership for everyone! At Spavia, you receive a spa experience at an affordable price in a beautiful setting. You receive treatments from the utmost professional specialists who deliver results in a peaceful, resort-like setting. Join the Spavia wellness membership and be part of a routine that helps you relax, recenter, and renew every month! In our world that is fast paced and stressful, it is essential to take a break and give time to you each month. Our full line of treatments include massage, skin care, body wraps and scrubs, waxing, tanning, and more. There is something for everyone to enjoy, help reduce stress, and deliver results, to support wellness each month. Spavia is open 7 days a week to offer hours in meeting the demands of your schedule. You may also schedule your spa appointments online for more convenience! Spavia is your place, your retreat, with a relaxing atmosphere and resort-like amenities including spa robes, spa sandals, a relaxing retreat area, tea offerings, warm aromatherapy neck pillows, stone-floored showers and more! With each of your spa treatments customized to your preference, there is no better place than Spavia to help you relax, recenter, and renew! Membership Terms and Conditions A valid credit card and email address is required for participation in Spavia’s Membership Wellness program. The benefits associated with a Spavia Membership Wellness program include a monthly treatment (“Membership Treatment”), unique offers, promotions and retail product discounts. Monthly Membership Treatments are to be redeemed each month. Membership Treatments that are not used during their respective Membership Month can rollover (“Rollover Treatment”) and be used for 12 months after their respective Monthly Charge Date, as long as the member is an active member. Members are permitted to redeem one Rollover Treatment per Membership Month, in addition to the current month’s Membership Treatment. Appointments must be canceled at least 24 hours in advance, otherwise the appointment will be considered to have been used and an available Membership or Rollover Treatment will be redeemed. If a Membership Treatment is not available, members will be charged 50% of the regular price of the scheduled treatment. Memberships are non-transferable and non-refundable, however, in accordance with the rules of Spavia’s Family Share program, members may designate one family member or significant other to redeem monthly Membership Treatments or Rollover Treatments. The minimum, non-cancellable, term of a membership is three (3) months. After the minimum term, memberships will be automatically renewed for successive one month periods, unless and until the membership is canceled. Memberships may be suspended for up to three months per calendar year. During suspension, membership benefits may not be used, including rollovers and special member savings or offers. Memberships may be canceled at any time with at least thirty (30) days written notice after the three month minimum term. Spavia reserves the right to modify the terms and conditions of the Membership Wellness program upon advance prior written notice to its members and to cancel membership at any time. Upon cancellation of a membership, members will no longer be entitled to use the benefits of the Membership Wellness program, including redemption of unredeemed Membership Treatments, Rollover Treatments and discounted Gift Cards. Spavia retains the right to terminate membership at any time, for any reason. Section Four Section Five Spavia...what you need more often. Enjoy a full spa experience, share a Spalebration with us, or gift a spa treatment. Benefits for All Tiers 10% off Spa Boutique Purchases | 10% off  Waxing Treatments | Member Perk for Friends | $15 Savings on Upgraded Treatments | 50% off All Boosts | Family Share | VIP Events Choice of aromatherapy Choice of music Choice of conversation Resort-inspired amenities Relaxing retreat rooms Stone floored showers Spa robes and spa sandals Savings in our spa boutique Selection of exotic teas Spa atmosphere of aromatherapy, waterfalls and candles Warm aromatherapy neck pillow to completely create an exceptional spa experience, just for you!
